DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effect of the combination of everolimus and letrozole compared to placebo and letrozole as pre-surgical therapy in patients with newly diagnosed estrogen receptor positive breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Everolimus and Letrozole as Preoperative Therapy of Primary Breast Cancer in Post-menopausal Women
